entry.title: testblog
entry.content: this is a test file for my own blog based on github page powerd by Hexo 这里是中文字体的测试 1234// 这是一段代码int a = 1;int b = 2;int result = a+b;

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment 这是一段测试代码123456789101112131415- (void)clearAllChatRecord{ [WJAlertSheetView showAlertSheetViewWithTips:@"确认清空所有聊天记录？清空后将无法恢复" items:@[@"确定"] completion:^(NSInteger index,UIButton *item) { if (index == 1) { BOOL success = [[DBManager shareManager] deleteAllMessageRecord]; [MBProgressHUD hideHUD]; if (!success) { [MBProgressHUD showLabelWithText:@"清除失败，请重试"]; }else{ [MBProgressHUD showLabelWithText:@"清除完成"]; } } }]; // 测试文字}
